mapper.insert: insert into keyword_history ( keyword,user_info, user_ip) values ( #{keyword}, #{userInfo}, #{userIP})
mapper.select:
SELECT S.turn as turnExam, S.class as classExam, S.TYPE as typeExam, S.title as titleExam, S.pkg as pkgExam FROM ( ( SELECT a.turn, a.class, a.TYPE, a.title, 'real' AS pkg FROM real_exam a, ( SELECT turn FROM real_exam GROUP BY turn ORDER BY turn *1 desc LIMIT 10 ) b WHERE b.turn = a.turn AND class <>'컴시응' AND type LIKE '1_%' ) UNION ALL ( SELECT a.turn, a.class, a.TYPE, a.title, 'kpc_1' AS pkg FROM kpc_exam a, ( SELECT turn FROM kpc_exam GROUP BY turn ORDER BY turn desc LIMIT 10 ) b WHERE b.turn = a.turn AND TYPE = '1' AND class <>'응용' AND title NOT LIKE '%(응용)%' ) UNION ALL ( SELECT a.turn, a.class, a.TYPE, a.title, 'kpc_2' AS pkg FROM kpc_exam_2 a, ( SELECT turn FROM kpc_exam_2 GROUP BY turn ORDER BY turn desc LIMIT 5 ) b WHERE b.turn = a.turn AND class <>'응용' AND title NOT LIKE '%(응용)%' AND TYPE IN ( '1_1', '2_1', '3_1', '4_1','5_1') )
UNION ALL ( SELECT a.turn, a.class, a.TYPE, a.title, 'ilifo' AS pkg FROM ilifo_exam a, ( SELECT turn FROM ilifo_exam GROUP BY turn ORDER BY orderby desc LIMIT 5 ) b WHERE b.turn = a.turn AND TYPE = '1' AND class <>'응용' AND title NOT LIKE '%(응용)%' )
UNION ALL ( SELECT a.turn, a.class, a.TYPE, a.title, 'lyzeum' AS pkg FROM lyzeum_exam a, ( SELECT turn FROM lyzeum_exam GROUP BY turn ORDER BY orderby desc LIMIT 4 ) b WHERE b.turn = a.turn AND TYPE = '1' AND class <>'응용' AND title NOT LIKE '%(응용)%' ) ) S ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 13

SELECT S.turn as turnExam, S.class as classExam, S.TYPE as typeExam, S.title as titleExam, S.pkg as pkgExam FROM ( ( SELECT a.turn, a.class, a.TYPE, a.title, 'real' AS pkg FROM real_exam a, ( SELECT turn FROM real_exam GROUP BY turn ORDER BY turn *1 desc LIMIT 10 ) b WHERE b.turn = a.turn AND class <>'컴시응' AND type not LIKE '1_%' AND type not LIKE '0%' AND title NOT LIKE '%(응용)%' ) UNION ALL ( SELECT a.turn, a.class, a.TYPE, a.title, 'kpc_1' AS pkg FROM kpc_exam a, ( SELECT turn FROM kpc_exam GROUP BY turn ORDER BY turn desc LIMIT 10 ) b WHERE b.turn = a.turn AND TYPE <> '1' AND class <>'응용' AND title NOT LIKE '%(응용)%' ) UNION ALL ( SELECT a.turn, a.class, a.TYPE, a.title, 'kpc_2' AS pkg FROM kpc_exam_2 a, ( SELECT turn FROM kpc_exam_2 GROUP BY turn ORDER BY turn desc LIMIT 5 ) b WHERE b.turn = a.turn AND class <>'응용' AND title NOT LIKE '%(응용)%' AND TYPE not IN ( '1_1', '2_1', '3_1', '4_1','5_1') )
UNION ALL ( SELECT a.turn, a.class, a.TYPE, a.title, 'ilifo' AS pkg FROM ilifo_exam a, ( SELECT turn FROM ilifo_exam GROUP BY turn ORDER BY orderby desc LIMIT 5 ) b WHERE b.turn = a.turn AND TYPE <> '1' AND class <>'응용' AND title NOT LIKE '%(응용)%' )
UNION ALL ( SELECT a.turn, a.class, a.TYPE, a.title, 'lyzeum' AS pkg FROM lyzeum_exam a, ( SELECT turn FROM lyzeum_exam GROUP BY turn ORDER BY orderby desc LIMIT 4 ) b WHERE b.turn = a.turn AND TYPE <> '1' AND class <>'응용' AND title NOT LIKE '%(응용)%' ) ) S ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 6

select inx as idx , turn as turnExam , class as classExam , type as typeExam , title as titleExam from real_exam where 1=1
title like '%#{keywordTitieArray}%'
turn like '%$keywordTurnArray[]$%'
order by turn*1 desc, classExam, typeExam*1 limit 75

select inx as idx , turn as turnExam , class as classExam , type as typeExam , title as titleExam from real_exam where 1=1
title LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%'
turn LIKE '%' #{keyword2} '%'
title not LIKE '%' #{keyword3} '%'
order by turn*1 desc, classExam, typeExam*1 limit 75

select inx as idx , turn as turnExam , class as classExam , type as typeExam , title as titleExam from kpc_exam_2 where 1=1
title LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%'
turn LIKE '%' #{keyword2} '%'
title not LIKE '%' #{keyword3} '%'
order by binary(turn) desc , type limit 12

select inx as idx , turn as turnExam , class as classExam , type as typeExam , title as titleExam from kpc_exam where 1=1
title LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%'
turn LIKE '%' #{keyword2} '%'
title not LIKE '%' #{keyword3} '%'
order by binary(turn) desc, class, type limit 78

select inx as idx , turn as turnExam , class as classExam , type as typeExam , title as titleExam from ilifo_exam where 1=1
title LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%'
turn LIKE '%' #{keyword2} '%'
title not LIKE '%' #{keyword3} '%'
order by orderby desc , turn*1 desc ,type limit 41

select inx as idx , turn as turnExam , class as classExam , type as typeExam , title as titleExam from flip_exam where 1=1
title LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%'
turn LIKE '%' #{keyword2} '%'
title not LIKE '%' #{keyword3} '%'
order by ORDERby DESC, turn*1 desc limit 41

select inx as idx , turn as turnExam , class as classExam , type as typeExam , title as titleExam from jud_exam where 1=1
title LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%'
turn LIKE '%' #{keyword2} '%'
title not LIKE '%' #{keyword3} '%'
order by date_format(in_date, '%Y%m%d' ) desc,turn*1 desc limit 77

select inx as idx , turn as turnExam , class as classExam , type as typeExam , title as titleExam from lyzeum_exam where 1=1
title LIKE '%' #{keyword} '%'
turn LIKE '%' #{keyword2} '%'
title not LIKE '%' #{keyword3} '%'
order by turn desc limit 41
